Text: If you like Lexi, hell even if you hate her you've got to have this in you collection, this is the best porn DVD I've ever watched (interacted with). Pity there was no anal option.
I usualy get thinks to work, but i can't get this to work... So, how do i get it to work? :P
never mind, vlc, i'm so dumb...

I cant get any of these file to work properly with all the actual interaction. help anyone? I have tired deamon tools and poweriso and dvdshrink
vlc will play the files but there are no menu buttons available. I just have a bunch of .vob files which play in vlc and then there is a bunch of .bup and .ifo files.
Can't get it to work. Help!
I have used deamon lite with Wnidows media player and it seems to work the best.

General FYI:
To play these with VLC you need to right click the file and click "Play with VLC" in the bar that pops up. If you do it any other way with VLC, then you'll basically play all the pieces in order rather than have it be interactive.
